Class Trap

java.lang.Object
com.goblinskeep.objects.MainObject
com.goblinskeep.objects.Trap
public class Trap extends MainObject
Represents a trap that deducts points when a player steps on it. - The trap is **always active** and deducts points upon collision. - After the **first collision**, it has a **1-second cooldown** before it can deduct points again. - The trap does **not block movement**, meaning the player can walk over it.
